title: How do I cope with being subhuman?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I'm in a similar situation, I don't look to date so I'm not really an "incel" but the genetic lottery affects me negatively elsewhere. Failing at a different goal but for the same reason. People just won't admit that this place is naturally bad, either they outright deny it or they make up some crazy idolatry of nature and somehow manage to say "that's good".

guild.ban_reason: Take a shower and go outside already

post.title: How do I cope with being subhuman?

body: Hard not to compare myself with others when I get brutally mogged in every social situation. I would like to leave society and live in the woods, but I want a relationship more.
